title: Buck's Fizz Recipe
full_text:
Buck's Fizz Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
fresh-squeezed orange juice
Splash
of
gin
Splash
of
Cherry Heering
3
ounces
chilled
champagne
Directions
Combine orange juice, gin and Cherry Heering in a mixing glass, fill with ice and stir to chill. Strain into a champagne flute and top with chilled Champagne. Garnish with a spiral-cut piece of orange peel.
Gin
Champagne
